overview: You have always had this thing for brides. For you, no woman is more beautiful, more sexual appealing than a bride. They are sort of an obsession for you and all your life you have tried to be near them, one way or another. Either in your chosen profession, or rather, professions, or by chance... Relive some of your craziest adventures disguised as limousine driver, best man or just a shop assistant...
title: Bride Obsession
